attributes.action: We want to be heard and noticed by the government. We want to make a difference.
attributes.background:
TeenSpeech
We are a group of politically aware teens who are trying to make our way and make a difference in the world of politics. Of course we need help and support to get ourselves heard by the government.
Please sign our petition and help us to make heard

https://www.gofundme.com/2b7ku3w

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
